title: effect to Commission Regulation (EU) 2021/57 of 25 January 20211 amending
heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the Chemicals Act 2008 (Lead in
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the Chemicals Act 2008 (Lead in 

Gunshot in or around Wetlands) Regulations 2023.
text_norm: 1 regulation may cited chemical act 2008 (lead gunshot around wetlands) regulation 2023

title: effect to Commission Regulation (EU) 2021/57 of 25 January 20211 amending
heading: In these Regulations “Act of 2008” means the Chemicals Act 2008 (No.
text_raw:
2. 

In these Regulations “Act of 2008” means the Chemicals Act 2008 (No. 

13 of 2008).

title: effect to Commission Regulation (EU) 2021/57 of 25 January 20211 amending
heading: 3. Section 8(3) of the Act of 2008 is amended -
text_raw:
3. Section 8(3) of the Act of 2008 is amended - 

(a) 

in paragraph (c), by the substitution of “pollution;” for 
“pollution.”, and 

(b) by the insertion of the following paragraph after paragraph (c): 

“(d) the Minister for Housing, Local Government and Heritage, 
for the purposes only of paragraphs 11 and 13 in entry 63 
of Annex XVII to that Regulation.”.
text_norm: 3 section 8(3) act 2008 amended - (a) paragraph (c) substitution pollution pollution (b) insertion following paragraph paragraph (c) (d) minister housing local government heritage purpose paragraph 11 13 entry 63 annex xvii regulation

title: effect to Commission Regulation (EU) 2021/57 of 25 January 20211 amending
heading: 4. Section 29(3) of the Act of 2008 is amended -
text_raw:
4. Section 29(3) of the Act of 2008 is amended - 

(a) 

(b) 

in paragraph (e), by the substitution of “Regulation,” for 
“Regulation, or”, 

in paragraph (f), by the substitution of “article, or” for “article”, 
and 

(c) 

by the insertion of the following paragraph after paragraph (f): 

“(g) in relation to paragraph 11 in entry 63 of Annex XVII to 

the REACH Regulation, a person,”.

title: effect to Commission Regulation (EU) 2021/57 of 25 January 20211 amending
heading: 5. Section 30 of the Act of 2008 is amended –
text_raw:
5. Section 30 of the Act of 2008 is amended – 

(a) 

in subsection (1), by the substitution of “subsection (3)(g) and 
subsection (16)” for “subsection (16)”, and 

1 OJ L 24, 26.1.2021, p. 19. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 31st October, 2023. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [517] 3 

(b) by the insertion of the following subsection after subsection (2): 

“(2A) A person guilty of an offence under section 29(3)(g) 
shall be liable – 

(a) 

on summary conviction, to a class A fine or 
imprisonment for a term not exceeding 12 months or 
both, or 

(b) on conviction on indictment, to a fine not exceeding 
€500,000 or imprisonment for a term not exceeding 
3 years or both.”. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

26 October, 2023. 

SIMON COVENEY, 

Minister for Enterprise, Trade and Employment.

title: effect to Commission Regulation (EU) 2021/57 of 25 January 20211 amending
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation) 

The purpose of these Regulations is to amend the Chemicals Act 2008 (No. 13 
of 2008) to designate the Minister for Housing, Local Government and 
Heritage as the competent authority in Ireland for Regulation (EU) 2021/57 of 
25 January 2021 amending Annex XVII to Regulation (EC) No 1907/2006 of 
the European Parliament and of the Council concerning the Registration, 
Evaluation, Authorisation and Restriction of Chemicals (REACH) as regards 
lead in gunshot in or around wetlands. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 [517] 5
